Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.35087243]Virus:SARS-CoV-2 Omicron:inhibition of cell-cell fusion in Calu-3 cells(IC50=3.32 nM);inhibition of cell-cell infusion in Caco2 cells(IC50=0.88 nM);inhibition of infection(Pseudovirus)(IC50=8.63 nM);inhibition of infection(Authentic)(IC50=85.38 nM);SARS-CoV-2 Delta:inhibition of cell-cell fusion(IC50=4.04 nM);inhibition of infection(Pseudovirus)(IC50=9.83 nM);SARS-CoV-2 D614G:inhibition of cell-cell fusion(IC50=2.57 nM);inhibition of infection(Pseudovirus)(IC50=5.58 nM).[Ref.32231345]Virus:SARS-CoV:ihibition of cell-cell fusion in Huh-7 cells(IC50=4.3 nM),inhibition of Pseudovirus (PsV) infection in 293T/ACE2 cells(IC50=11.7 nM);MERS-CoV:ihibition of cell-cell fusion in Huh-7 cells(IC50=2.5 nM),inhibition of Pseudovirus (PsV) infection in Huh-7 cells(IC50=11.1 nM),inhibit the replication of MERS-CoV in VERO-E6 cells(IC50=4.2 nM);HCoV-OC43:ihibition of cell-cell fusion in Huh-7 cells(IC50=7.7 nM),inhibition of Pseudovirus (PsV) infection in 293T/ACE2 cells(IC50=37.7 nM),inhibit the replication of HCoV-OC43 in RD cells(IC50=24.8 nM);HCoV-229E:ihibition of cell-cell fusion in Huh-7 cells(IC50=5.2 nM),inhibition of Pseudovirus (PsV) infection in Huh-7 cells(IC50=12.4 nM),inhibit the replication of HCoV-229E in Huh-7 cells(IC50=101.5 nM);HCoV-NL63:ihibition of cell-cell fusion in Huh-7 cells(IC50=21.4 nM),inhibition of Pseudovirus (PsV) infection in Huh-7 cells(IC50=76.6 nM),inhibit the replication of HCoV-NL63 in LLC-MK2 cells(IC50=187.6 nM);CoV-WIV1:ihibition of cell-cell fusion in Huh-7 cells(IC50=4.5 nM),inhibition of Pseudovirus (PsV) infection in Huh-7 cells(IC50=30.8 nM);CoV-Rs3367:ihibition of cell-cell fusion in Huh-7 cells(IC50=8.1 nM),inhibition of Pseudovirus (PsV) infection in Huh-7 cells(IC50=66.9 nM);CoV-SHC014:ihibition of cell-cell fusion in Huh-7 cells(IC50=4.3 nM);SARS-CoV-2:ihibition of cell-cell fusion in 293T/ACE2 cells(IC50=1.3 nM),inhibition of Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.32231345]<10% cytotoxicity against VERO-E6 cells, RD cells, LLC-MK2 cells, Huh-7 cells up to 10000 nM.
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: The peptide acted as a fusion inhibitor which against SARS-CoV-2 S protein-mediated membrane fusion and pseudovirus infection.

Literature.Title: Peptide-based pan-CoV fusion inhibitors maintain high potency against SARS-CoV-2 Omicron variant.
Literature.Author: Xia S, Chan JF, Wang L, Jiao F, Chik KK, Chu H, Lan Q, Xu W, Wang Q, Wang C, Yuen KY, Lu L, Jiang S.

Literature.Title: Inhibition of SARS-CoV-2 (previously 2019-nCoV) infection by a highly potent pan-coronavirus fusion inhibitor targeting its spike protein that harbors a high capacity to mediate membrane fusion.
Literature.Author: Xia S, Liu M, Wang C, Xu W, Lan Q, Feng S, Qi F, Bao L, Du L, Liu S, Qin C, Sun F, Shi Z, Zhu Y, Jiang S, Lu L.
